_description: The original gold standard. D.E.P.T.H. Method is FM-specific and should NOT be used by other niches.

steps.title: Discover the Root Cause
steps.description: Comprehensive health history intake to uncover hidden triggers, toxin exposure, and gut-health correlations

steps.description: Assess the 5 key body systems (gut, hormones, detox, immune, energy) to find interconnected dysfunction

steps.description: Create a personalized nutrition and lifestyle protocol based on the client's unique system imbalances

steps.title: Transform Through Action

steps.title: Heal & Sustain
steps.description: Track progress, celebrate milestones, and build sustainable habits for long-term wellness
